actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Rereferred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to guarantee certain State, local, or other public agency bonds issued to finance water resource facilities.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to guarantee State, local, and other public agency bonds issued to finance water resource facilities for conservation, storage, or distribution purposes.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to guarantee certain State, local, or other public agency bonds issued to finance water resource facilities.
